name: belingoAntiSpam
author: Belingo llc

sections.description: A simple and effective anti-spam plugin for WordPress. The plugin algorithm analyzes user behavior on the site and, if necessary, marks it as spam, after which all bot actions are blocked. The plugin does not have any complex settings and is very easy to install, just install and activate. That’s all! Your WordPress is protected.
sections.installation:
1. Upload belingoantispam to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate Belingo.AntiSpam in your wordpress site if it is not activated already.
sections.changelog:
1.2.4

  • Fix cookie save

1.2.3

  • Added a check for the enabled check by moderator option

1.2.2

  • fixed comment approve, now comment go to spam automatically

1.2.1

  • Fixed a bug when adding and editing users in the admin panel

1.2

  • Added protection against spam in comments

1.1

  • Added protection against automatic registrations

1.0

  • First release.
